name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productive Tabs - have only one tab per site

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that prevents opening multiple tabs for one hostname

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension will prevent moving to new tabs with a hostname that already opened: you will be redirected to that tab automatically.
